title: Curly Loop

adjectives: Consisting of or covered with or having loops
nouns: A short twisting or wiggling line or mark
A short twisting or wiggling line or mark.

description:
A curled loop, which is shown in black on most platforms. Previously displayed as a blue ribbon on Samsung devices.

Similar to the Double Curly Loop but with only a single loop.
apple_vendor_description: The curly loop emoji on Apple devices is a vibrant, bold red spiral that draws the eye with its energetic twists and turns, brought to life by Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and bright highlights. Its smooth, rounded edges give it a playful, almost bouncy feel, suggesting movement and excitement. This visually engaging emoji is perfect for adding emphasis, excitement, or a sense of playful exuberance to messages, often used to punctuate enthusiastic statements or add a flourish to text.
